纽温https://www.neowin.net/ 纽温en-us纽温点火新闻editor@neowin.net（总编辑） Developers@neowin.net（Neowin 开发者） 5新文网https://www.neowin.net/images/pegasus/icon.png https://www.neowin.net 三星推出 Galaxy S25、S25+ 和 S25 Ultra 智能手机https://www.neowin.net/news/samsung-launches-galaxy-s25-s25-and-s25-ultra-smartphones/
;;
;三星最新旗舰设备 Galaxy S25、S25+ 和S25 Ultra 已在 Galaxy Unpacked 2025 上正式发布。;阅读更多...;阿迪亚·蒂瓦里Wed, 22 Jan 2025 19:06:29 +0000 https://www.neowin.net/news/samsung-launches-galaxy-s25-s25-and-s25-ultra-smartphones/ #三星#GalaxyUnpacked @TheLazyAvenger 两种新尺寸的三星 Galaxy Ring 现已在这些市场上发售https://www.neowin.net/news/two-new-sizes-of-the-samsung-galaxy-ring-are-now-available-for-purchase-in-these-markets/
;;
;增加了两种新的戒指尺寸，三星现在提供 11 种尺寸的健康追踪 Galaxy Ring 设备。 ;阅读更多...;萨加尔·纳雷什·巴夫萨尔Wed, 22 Jan 2025 18:56:51 +0000 https://www.neowin.net/news/two-new-sizes-of-the-samsung-galaxy-ring-are-now-available-for-purchase-in-these-markets/ #三星#GalaxyRing @@SNB3112 三星 Galaxy S25 Ultra 是首款配备康宁大猩猩装甲 2 保护的设备https://www.neowin.net/news/samsung-galaxy-s25-ultra-is-the-first-device-to-come-with-corning-gorilla-armor-2-protection/
;;
;第二代大猩猩玻璃保护提供卓越的耐用性，是业界首创用于智能手机的防刮、抗反射玻璃陶瓷覆盖材料。 ;阅读更多...;萨加尔·纳雷什·巴夫萨尔Wed, 22 Jan 2025 18:46:01 +0000 https://www.neowin.net/news/samsung-galaxy-s25-ultra-is-the-first-device-to-come-with-corning-gorilla-armor-2-protection/ #三星#GalaxyS25Ultra @@SNB3112 Insomniac Games 创始人退出，三名退伍军人成为联合工作室负责人https://www.neowin.net/news/insomniac-games-Founder-exits-as- Three-veterans-become-co-studio-heads/
;;
;PlayStation 第一方工作室 Insomniac Games 将获得三款联合工作室负责人接替即将卸任的创始人泰德·普莱斯 (Ted Price)。 ;了解更多...;普拉斯提·阿里亚辛赫Wed, 22 Jan 2025 18:30:01 +0000 https://www.neowin.net/news/insomniac-games-Founder-exits-as- Three-veterans-become-co-studio-heads/ #索尼#PlayStation @LoneWolfSL 谷歌和三星推出适合儿童的 Galaxy Watch 体验https://www.neowin.net/news/google-and-samsung-launch-kid-friend-galaxy-watch-experience/
;;
;谷歌和三星联手推出一款适合儿童的智能手表体验，帮助孩子们在没有手机的情况下保持联系。 ;了解更多...;阿迪亚·蒂瓦里Wed, 22 Jan 2025 18:16:02 +0000 https://www.neowin.net/news/google-and-samsung-launch-kid-friend-galaxy-watch-experience/ #三星#GalaxyWatch @TheLazyAvenger 购买适用于 Windows/Mac 的 H&R Block Tax Software Deluxe + State 2024 可节省 33% https://www.neowin.net/deals/save-33-on-hr-block-tax-software-deluxe--state-2024-for-windowsmac/
;;
;通过 H&R Block Deluxe 放心地报税。获得最大的扣除额、准确性检查和易于使用的工具，以简化联邦和州的税务准备。 ;了解更多...< /a>;纽温优惠Wed, 22 Jan 2025 18:00:01 +0000 https://www.neowin.net/deals/save-33-on-hr-block-tax-software-deluxe--state-2024-for-windowsmac/ #HRBlock #税收#Deal @史蒂夫帕克 Microsoft 即将删除下载所有免费官方 Windows 11 和 10 主题的简单方法https://www.neowin.net/news/microsoft-to-soon-remove-an-easy-way-to-download-all-free-official-windows-11--10-themes/
;;
;微软已确认将很快删除用户在 Windows 上访问和下载主题的便捷方式11 和 10。 ;阅读更多...;萨彦森Wed, 22 Jan 2025 16:40:01 +0000 https://www.neowin.net/news/microsoft-to-soon-remove-an-easy-way-to-download-all-free-official-windows-11--10-themes/ #Microsoft #Windows #主题 《毁灭战士：黑暗时代》的发售日期可能在 Xbox Direct 展示之前泄露https://www.neowin.net/news/doom-the-dark-ages-release-date-may-have-leaked-ahead-of-xbox-direct-showcase/
;;
;领先于在明天的 Xbox Direct 展示会上，泄密事件可能泄露了《毁灭战士：黑暗时代》的发售日期。 ;了解更多。 ..;普拉斯提·阿里亚辛赫Wed, 22 Jan 2025 16:16:01 +0000 https://www.neowin.net/news/doom-the-dark-ages-release-date-may-have-leaked-ahead-of-xbox-direct-showcase/ #DoomDarkAges #idSoftware @LoneWolfSL Data Science Essentials For Dummies 电子书（价值 10 美元）免费下载https://www.neowin.net/spoken/data-science-essentials-for-dummies-ebook-worth-10-free-download/
;;
;Data Science Essentials For Dummies 是一本可靠的参考资料，非常适合作为学习者随身携带日常办公桌参考。 ;了解更多...;赞助Wed, 22 Jan 2025 16:00:01 +0000 https://www.neowin.net/spoken/data-science-essentials-for-dummies-ebook-worth-10-free-download/ #eBook #Free #ForDummies @史蒂夫帕克 微软对未经许可的 OneDrive 帐户发出重要警告https://www.neowin.net/news/microsoft-has-an-important-warning-about-unlicensed-onedrive-accounts/
;;
;微软已向管理员发出有关未经许可的 OneDrive 帐户的警告。这些更改将于 1 月 27 日生效。;了解更多...;保罗·希尔Wed, 22 Jan 2025 15:04:01 +0000 https://www.neowin.net/news/microsoft-has-an-important-warning-about-unlicensed-onedrive-accounts/ #OneDrive #微软 Google 为托管 Chromebook 带来了“类工具”功能集https://www.neowin.net/news/google-brings-class-tools-feature-set-for-management-chromebooks/
;;
;Google 宣布推出名为“类工具”的新功能集。供教师控制托管 Chromebook。 ;了解详情...;阿迪亚·蒂瓦里Wed, 22 Jan 2025 14:48:02 +0000 https://www.neowin.net/news/google-brings-class-tools-feature-set-for-management-chromebooks/ #谷歌#Chromebook @TheLazyAvenger
